summary.address: Plot 157 EPIP Zone, 2nd Phase, Whitefield, BANGALORE, 560066, India
summary.overview: Infinite Computer Solutions (India) Limited is a provider of software consultancy and information technology (IT) support services. The Company provides application management outsourcing, remote infrastructure management services, research and development, and intellectual property leveraged solutions and related IT services. Its messaging platform provides messaging products and services portfolio, including an Enterprise Messaging Services Suite (EMS), Secure Messaging through NetSfere, Short Message Service (SMS), Multimedia Message Service (MMS), SMS Gateway, Public Safety Messaging, Rich Communication Suite (RCS) and Personal Messaging Cloud (PMC). It focuses on providing Internet protocol (IP) led solutions to telecom original equipment manufacturers (OEMs)/ independent software vendor (ISV), telecom service providers, content distribution enterprises and technology companies. Its solutions include business technology, mobile messaging and product engineering solutions.
